content: this pattern was reissued under a new name with a 2x size added see 90047ad inishturk fisherman sweater and tam 1 note the inishturk pattern is charted while the original is not > the aran sweater with its richly decorative patterns had its beginnings on three tiny islands off the western coast of ireland today this style of knitting is prized the world over in our own version the 100% fishermen s wool shows off the braided cables and textured stitches perfectly lion brand pattern #1101 skill level intermediate level 3 size small medium large 1x finished chest 40 44 48 52 inches length 24½ 25 25 25½ inches fishermen s wool® article #150 3-4 balls *materials are sufficient to make both items in the set* knitting needles - size 7 4 5 mm & size 8 5 mm split ring stitch markers stitch holders cable needles directions for tam are included in pdf download requires 1 ball yarn fisherman sweater and tam #l10164 is same pattern including the 56 / 2x size and is made with martha stewart crafts merino /yarns/library/lion-brand-martha-stewart-crafts-merino https //www lionbrand com/products/knitting-pattern-fisherman-sweater-hat-1 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/knitting-pattern-inishturk-sweater-tam-1 variant=32420295311453
